description: Chixia is a spirited young Patroller who lights up the streets of Jinzhou. She’s always ready to be the hero someone needs.

skills.name: POW POW
skills.description: Basic Attack Chixia fires up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG. Heavy Attack Chixia enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG. Mid-air Attack Chixia consumes STA to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Whizzing Fight Spirit
skills.description: Chixia unleashes a flurry of shots, dealing Fusion DMG. Whizzing Fight Spirit has 2 initial charges.

skills.name: Blazing Flames
skills.description: Chixia fires up fast shots at nearby enemies, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Scorching Magazine
skills.description: Max "Thermobaric Bullets" is increased by 10 rounds. The damage of Resonance Skill Boom Boom is increased by 50%.

skills.name: Numbingly Spicy!
skills.description: Each "Thermobaric Bullets" that hits a target during Resonance Skill DAKA DAKA! increases ATK by 1% for 10s, stacking up to 30 times.

skills.name: Grand Entrance
skills.description: Chixia makes a heroic entrance and fires rapidly with her dual pistols at the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Heroic Bullets
skills.description: Resonance Skill: DAKA DAKA! Hold Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit to enter DAKA DAKA!. In this state: Chixia continuously consumes "Thermobaric Bullets" to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage; Tap Basic Attack to cast Basic Attack 4, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Basic Attack damage. Then she terminates "DAKA DAKA!"; ·If 30 "Thermobaric Bullets" have been fired when Basic Attack is activated, Chixia will cast Resonance Skill Boom Boom and terminate "DAKA DAKA!" Chixia terminates "DAKA DAKA!" when all "Thermobaric Bullets" are consumed. Resonance Skill: Boom Boom Deal Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage. Thermobaric Bullets Chixia can hold up to 60 "Thermobaric Bullets". Inherent Skill Scorching Magazine increases Max "Thermobaric Bullets" by 10. Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" for every Normal Attack POW POW on hit. Chixia obtains "Thermobaric Bullets" upon casting Intro Skill Grand Entrance and Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

skills.name: Leaping Flames
skills.description: Chixia releases a shock wave surrounding the target, dealing Fusion DMG equal to 530.00% of Chixia's ATK to enemies within the range.

resonanceChain.name: No.1 Hero Play Fan
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill Boom Boom hits will always be Critical Hits.

resonanceChain.name: Leaping Sparkles
resonanceChain.description: During Resonance Liberation Blazing Flames, for every {0} target defeated, Chixia recovers {1} Resonance Energy, up to {2} each time.

resonanceChain.name: Eternal Flames
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Liberation Blazing Flames deals {1} more damage to targets whose HP is below {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Hero’s Ultimate Move
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Liberation Blazing Flames grants {0} “Thermobaric Bullets” and immediately resets the Cooldown of Resonance Skill Whizzing Fight Spirit.

resonanceChain.name: Triumphant Explosions
resonanceChain.description: When the Inherent Skill Numbingly Spicy! reaches max stacks, ATK is additionally increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Easter Egg Performance
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill Boom Boom increases the Basic Attack DMG Bonus of all team members by {0} for {1}s.

quote: Jinzhou Patroller, Chixia. You can always call on me if you ever find yourself in a pickle!
